channel.title: Need help making a no-ip server
channel.description: k i know my ip k i made a no-ip account. i downloaded a testscape source i need help setting up my no-ip acc and then after that what do i do...?

item.title: Need help making a no-ip server
item.dc:creator: @PandaScape PandaScape
item.description:
@PandaScape wrote:

well first i figured out my ip using a game.
then i made a no-ip acc at no-ip.com
then i downloaded the testscape source at the downloads page
then im at my port waiting to figure out where the “gaming” thing is[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 02:59:19 PM[/size][hr]Okay now I am trying to Port Forward but when i log into my router and go to NAT i dont see any “>port forwarding” tab there. can any1 explain why? cud it be that its cuz im not system manager but admin tht i cant do it or could it just be my provider wont allow it which prob aint true.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 05:19:50 PM[/size][hr]okay it only says

special application
virtual server

and on here

http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/AOpen/AOR-411/1st_SMTP_Server.htm

it shows them having a

port forewarding

tab

Read full topic
